email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 15,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel candidate and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thanks for reaching out. We have the vessel OCEAN BREEZE available for your route. The initial freight quote is USD 45 per metric tonne. The vessel has a DWT of 75,000 and an LOA of 225m. The laycan dates are from November 20 to November 25.

Best,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of USD 45 seems a bit high considering the current market conditions. Could you possibly review this? Also, could you specify the demurrage rates applicable and the expected loading window in Newcastle?

Looking forward to your revised offer.
Best, Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Liam,

Considering your feedback, we can revise the freight quote to USD 42 per metric tonne. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day. The loading window in Newcastle is expected to be from November 20 to November 22.

Let me know if this revised offer meets your requirements.
Best,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Final Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the revised offer. The rate of USD 42 per metric tonne and the demurrage rate of USD 12,000 per day are acceptable. Please proceed with the booking for the OCEAN BREEZE with the laycan dates from November 20 to November 25.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
